name: Warm Prism
description:
Noah was on the bus headed towards the Prism camp to join the activities that had been prepared to forget about one’s problems and have a good time with friends. On the way, the bus had a breakdown, and at that moment Noah started getting to know the rest of the passengers who joined the camp.

Who knows. The main goal is to enjoy the sports and get fit with the outdoor activities, but no one will mind building a romantic relationship with anyone who calls their attention enough. What’s your favorite color?


Story and programming by @s4urrr
Art by @skittlspls
Soundtrack by @NevaLOLL
Translation to English by @bennok24

Made for the A Rainbow of PosiTWOvity event at rpgmaker.net.

Available in both English and Spanish.
